inclusion.criterion: confirmed histologic diagnosis of an aggressive B-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: morphologic appearance of DLBCL or high-grade B-cell lymphoma (HGBL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: DLBCL, NOS, Activated B-cell type (ABC) or DLBCL, NOS, Germinal center B-cell type (GCB)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: T-cell/histiocyte-rich large B-cell lymphoma or Primary cutaneous DLBCL, leg-type
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: EBV+ DLBCL, NOS or ALK+ large B-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: High-grade B-cell lymphoma, NOS or High-grade B-cell lymphoma, with MYC and BCL2 and/or BCL6 rearrangements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable lymph nodes or masses of at least 1.5 centimeters (cm) on baseline CT or Stage II, III, or IV disease as classified by the Ann Arbor Classification
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: baseline CT or Ann Arbor Classification

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status less than or equal to 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ and marrow function as defined below unless dysfunction is felt to be secondary to lymphoma involvement as determined by the treating investigator
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Primary DLBCL of the central nervous system (PCNSL) or Primary mediastinal B-cell lymphoma (PMBL)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Plasmablastic lymphoma or Intravascular large B-cell lymphoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: B-cell lymphoma, unclassifiable, with features intermediate between DLBCL and classical Hodgkin lymphoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior anti-cancer treatment for DLBCL prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major surgical procedure within 28 days of first dose of study drug
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a confirmed histologic diagnosis of an aggressive B-cell lymphoma and meets several inclusion criteria. However, the patient's medical history suggests that they may have had prior anti-cancer treatment for DLBCL, which would make them ineligible for enrollment.
